method.text: Cook the broccoli in fast boiling salted water until just tender. (Test the thickest part of the broccoli with a knife.)  Drain well. Arrange in an ovenproof serving dish with the strips of ham.

Meanwhile, melt the butter in a saucepan, stir in the flour and cook gently for 1 min. Remove the pan from the heat and gradually stir in the milk. Bring to the boil and continue to cook, stirring until the sauce thickens. Add <sup>3</sup>/<sub>4</sub> of the cheese and the mustard. Season.
Pour the sauce over the hot broccoli, sprinkle with the remaining cheese and breadcrumbs. Brown under the grill until cheese is golden and melted.

title: Broccoli, ham and cheese bake
